scripts.prepare:web: mkdir -p www www/gamesfx www/astgfx www/newsfxdesigned www/assets/music && cp -f index.html style.css script.js favicon.png Kaleidoscope_Magic.mp3 reveal1.mp3 reveal2.mp3 reveal3.mp3 reveal4.mp3 taporb.mp3 crystalballfx.mp4 galaxybg1b-h264.mp4 level5-h264.mp4 level8-h264.mp4 level10-h264.mp4 www/ && cp -f gamesfx/*.mp3 www/gamesfx/ && cp -f newsfxdesigned/*.mp3 www/newsfxdesigned/ && cp -f assets/music/*.mp3 www/assets/music/ && cp -f astgfx/*.png www/astgfx/
scripts.cap:init: npx cap init "Poly Oracle" com.polyoracle.app --web-dir www
scripts.cap:sync: npm run prepare:web && npx cap sync ios
scripts.bootstrap:ios: npm run install:cap && npm run cap:add:ios && npm run cap:sync
